video.title: Scissor Seven
video.synopsis: Seeking to recover his memory, a scissor-wielding, hairdressing, bungling quasi-assassin stumbles into a struggle for power among feuding factions.

episodes.synopsis: Cash-strapped Seven flunks a crash course in professional killing and opens a hair salon as a cover. First assignment: cut off a bride's hair.
episodes.title: How to get rich

episodes.synopsis: Meow, the Chief of Cats, hires Seven to wipe out an old flame. But after hearing a star-crossed interspecies love story, he attempts to make peace.
episodes.title: Blind your eyes

episodes.synopsis: It's scissors versus sword as Seven faces off against Thirteen. He's no match for his deft opponent — so he transforms into half a durian.
episodes.title: Seven VS Thirteen

episodes.synopsis: The Island Purity Society summons Seven to kill an underwear collector, but Seven encourages everyone to embrace their differences.
episodes.title: Assassinating underpantsman

episodes.synopsis: Seven shape-shifts into a cardboard box and contends with a stabby, swindling fruit vendor whose grandson got a bad haircut from Seven's shears.
episodes.title: Assassinating a Domineering Grannie

episodes.synopsis: Cola, Seven's next target, enlists his help in checking off a bucket list of mischievous deeds, but the client who hired Seven has a secret.
episodes.title: Assassinating a pretty girl

episodes.synopsis: On behalf of the underfunded coast guard, Seven agrees to kill the captain of a submarine that's threatening the island.
episodes.title: Assassinating Captain Jack

episodes.synopsis: Hired by a woman to assassinate her husband, Seven confronts — and bonds with — impervious bodyguard He Dachun, who makes a heartrending sacrifice.
episodes.title: Bodyguard Dachun

episodes.synopsis: Seven teams up with islanders to stop the Prince of Stan from extracting an energy rock and destroying the island, but Stan's technology is too robust.
episodes.title: Crisis on the Island

episodes.synopsis: Thirteen comes to Seven's aid in a heated clash with the Prince of Stan. Seven recalls his past as a prominent figure in Xuanwu.
episodes.title: Thousand Demon Daggers

episodes.synopsis: Thirteen's past comes to light: as the Plum Blossom Swordsman's estranged daughter, she joined the world of killers after a tragic incident.
episodes.title: Thirteen

episodes.synopsis: Da Bao reflects on Da Fei, who once faced King Pheasant in a fight so that his son Xiao Fei could become a fighter chicken instead of a dinner chicken.
episodes.title: King of Chicken (Part I)

episodes.synopsis: Seeking to avenge his friend, Da Bao throws his hat in the ring for a fight against King Pheasant, but in his current state he's going to need a boost.
episodes.title: King of Chicken (Part II)

episodes.synopsis: Determined to teach humans a lesson, Da Bao gives King Pheasant a taste of his own medicine and liberates the chickens from their coops.
episodes.title: King of Chicken (Part III)

episodes.synopsis: He Dachun enlists Seven's help defeating a group of assassins newly arrived on the island. A tin of hair wax saves the day.
episodes.title: Super Scissors

episodes.synopsis: Thirteen seeks to deliver on her promise and destroy Seven, but she must first overcome an assassin's worst enemy — emotion.
episodes.title: Thirteen vs Seven

episodes.synopsis: Mad Bark is outplayed by a new killer: a guitar-strumming dog whose acoustic "Magical Sound of Sadness" strikes a lethal chord.
episodes.title: Protecting Mad Bark

episodes.synopsis: With Seven's hands tied by an invisible lizard assassin, Cola convinces the Prince of Stan to take her to Stan.
episodes.title: The Stan Trip

episodes.synopsis: Captain Jack returns to settle scores with Seven, who summons the powers of the Thousand Demon Daggers.
episodes.title: Again, We Meet Captain Jack

episodes.synopsis: King Pheasant, now a Special Soldier for Stan, kidnaps Seven and Xiao Fei and sets out to kill Da Bao, but a ghost from the past returns.
episodes.title: Revenge of King Pheasant

episodes.synopsis: Seven prepares for a date with Thirteen. When he falls for a trap, he finds a way out of the bind by channeling his tonsorial qi.
episodes.title: Plum Blossom Eleven

episodes.synopsis: Back in the past, Seven joins the Shadow Killers, faces off against Redtooth and sets out in search of the Thousand Demon Daggers.
episodes.title: Two Heroes

episodes.synopsis: Redtooth arrives on the Island to confront Chairman Jiang, who activates the powerful White Lily Blossom with Seven's help.
episodes.title: Redtooth

episodes.synopsis: Seven reconnects with his old self, but to defeat the Blood Demon, he must harness the power of Xuanwu martial arts — and the barber within.
episodes.title: Fate

episodes.synopsis: After word spreads about Seven's triumph over the Blood Demon, Seven realizes he must leave the island in order to keep its residents safe.
episodes.title: Farewell

episodes.synopsis: Da Bao sets out with Xiao Fei in search of Seven and recalls how Seven once bent over backwards to help him find an antidote.
episodes.title: Dai Bo & Seven

episodes.synopsis: Seven makes a stopover in Dali Nation, known for its beautiful people — but an overlord with dark mirror magic has turned everyone hideous.
episodes.title: Excuse me, is this the Xuanwu Country?

episodes.synopsis: Plum Blossom Eleven talks He Dachun into escorting her to Xuanwu, but Flying Bird Gate members capture her, demanding their martial arts script back.
episodes.title: Tenderness of a Tough Man

episodes.synopsis: Seven arrives at He Dachun's hometown, where he must win a pentathlon against the muscular Coach Chen to save Xiao Fei from being eaten.
episodes.title: Rock Hard Country

episodes.synopsis: In Superpower Country, Seven encounters Pingan, a boy with mind control powers. A searing battle with the Prince of Stern erupts.
episodes.title: Superpower Country

episodes.synopsis: As Cola's life hangs by a thread, Seven sneaks into Xuanwu with Da Bao and Xiao Fei to find the medicine to cure her.
episodes.title: Sneaking into Xuanwu Country

episodes.synopsis: In Xuanwu, Seven faces the powerful Eyeless Sorcerer and undergoes a transformation. Thirteen struggles to choose a side.
episodes.title: Master Green Phoenix’s Scheme

episodes.synopsis: Seven fends off Xuanwu assassins while under the influence of the blade's powers, as memories of life on Chicken Island begin to fade.
episodes.title: Memories that You Don't Want to Forget Even in Pain

episodes.synopsis: Shadow assassin Manjusaka confronts Seven. In a true test of her powers, Thirteen engages in a heated clash with Blackbird.
episodes.title: Who Is the One You Want to Protect
